text:
@realDonaldTrump With your horrible economy, and the loss of 36 million + US jobs due to your Covid-19 failure, are you actually celebrating the loss of more US jobs? 

Were the articles in The Atlantic too truthful? 

People barely making it, won't be able to put $ into the economy.

You lose.
